events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been categorized under refund due to customer's request for money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and communicate with the customer.
Hello! Iâ€™m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I am here to assist you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund promptly?
My order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item that was delivered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and refund offer. Thank you for resolving this issue.
The refund process has been confirmed and the case is considered resolved from our side.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and are satisfied with how your case was handled.
Since the refund has been successfully received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now.
